```{r life forms}
library(dplyr)
library(stringr)
df <- read.csv("/data/InfoFlora/rawdata/1_Alps_dispersal_v2.csv",head=TRUE)
df2 <- read.csv("data/InfoFlora/1_dispersal_com.csv",head=TRUE)
merged_left  <- merge(df2, df, by = "species", all.x = TRUE)
write.csv(merged_left,"/data/InfoFlora/1_dispersal_com_2.csv")
df <- df %>%
  mutate(species2 = word(sc_name, 1, 2))

# define a named vector
map_vals <- c(
  LC    = 1,
  NT    = 2,
  VU    = 3,
  EN    = 4,
  CR    = 5,
  RE    = 6,
  "NE"   = 0,
  "NA"   = 0,    # string "NA"
  "DD"   = 0,
  "NULL" = 0     # string "NULL"
)

# map in one go
df <- df %>%
  mutate(
    # look up each status, then turn any unmapped (or real NA) into 0
    status_num = coalesce(map_vals[status], 0)
  )

```
